name: easycal
author: The EasyCal Team (http://code.google.com/p/easycal/people/list)
description: An appealing and easy-to-use calendar app.

preferences.name: show_time
preferences.title: show time
preferences.description: Show current time in the addon bar

preferences.name: show_event
preferences.title: show upcoming event number
preferences.description: Show how many upcoming events today in the addon bar

preferences.name: show_logo
preferences.title: show EasyCal logo
preferences.description: Show EasyCal logo in the addon bar.
